channel.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
channel.description:
For a $300 budget, is this a good deal on a Smart Parts ION XE? It comes with a 7 (6 pod + 1 w/e, but I use it for a pod) pod harness, 6 pods, goggles, a hopper, a 20oz CO2 tank and maintenance supplies [squeegee, oil, etc.]
Here's the link to the original eBay auction: [url=http://cgi.ebay.com/NEW-Smart-Parts-ION-XE-Elite-Paintball-Package-Deal_W0QQitemZ270216090763QQihZ017QQcategoryZ140121QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem]NEW Smart Parts ION XE Elite Paintball Package Deal[/url]

item.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:22, topic:186005”]Am i the only one who thinks shooting balls of paint at each other isn’t worth a lot of money [E.G. $300 on it]
Meh Paintball is sure of a lot of fun but I don’t get why people “Go pro” and spend a lot of money on it, its most fun when your going once in a while with a group of friends and paying £10 each for some rented gear.

amirite or is it really that much more fun to spend a lot of money on gear and play it lots?

Just want to say i’m not apposed, or looking for an arguement, just was wondering if it is worth it?[/quote]
Meh its alittle expensive but i mean it affordable at least for me.

And the reason people go pro is cause they like the sport and there getting to play it free…

When you go pro you have sponsors that supplies you with paint and guns.

Also when you win like NPPL’s and PSP events you get money or what ever from that. (Ive played PSP event and won $500 and 5 cases of diablo heat paint)

Read full topic

item.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:22, topic:186005”]Am i the only one who thinks shooting balls of paint at each other isn’t worth a lot of money [E.G. $300 on it]
Meh Paintball is sure of a lot of fun but I don’t get why people “Go pro” and spend a lot of money on it, its most fun when your going once in a while with a group of friends and paying £10 each for some rented gear.

amirite or is it really that much more fun to spend a lot of money on gear and play it lots?

Just want to say i’m not apposed, or looking for an arguement, just was wondering if it is worth it?[/quote]
Well, you are sorta right. My paintball place is full of jews, and you have to pay $60 for rental, another $10 for admission, $5 for CO2 + they only give you 500 paintballs free (if you rent, its ~$100 for a case of 2000 balls). I go a lot with my friends, so overall I save MUCH more money by buying my own equipment, since you get free CO2, and paintballs are cheaper ($100 for 5000 balls), and only have to pay the $10 for admission. So, considering that I’m 38.6% Jewish, I’d much rather buy the gun once, and get everything cheaper, than spend upwards of $175 every two weeks.

So, I’d say it’s worth it…

Read full topic

Just want to say i’m not apposed, or looking for an arguement, just was wondering if it is worth it?

item.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

@.nyx: Yeah, I was gonna get an Electra, until my friend’s friend got one, and said it chopped like a fucking butcher.
If you’re really cheap, a Spyder Pilot ACS (my current gun), is a relatively good “budget gun”.

Read full topic

item.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=".nyx., post:17, topic:186005"][quote author=mrrules link=topic=248342.msg2089112#msg2089112 date=1204700364]

tippman > mrrules

tippmans blow dick…

get out of woodsball before you talk paintball kid?

Ion has prob 5x the BPS as a tippman and they are almost same price.

And if you run any ion on co2 your gonna get laughed off the field trust me. (ESP when you have a 200 and your trying to be hot then you use a cheap c02 tank?)

No one even uses co2 with spyders any more , plus nitrogen is way better for weather. (Just don’t leave in the sun or the nippe will blow out and you will have to get a new tank.)

EDIT: oh also for the kid above talking about tippmans , they arn’t even considered a pro gun… Ion’s are semi pro guns (cheapest pro gun you can get on market and close to it is a Epiphany)
[/quote]
i have to agree. i had a tippman 98 pro custom, and though it was a sturdy gun, it wasn’t fast enough for me. i moved on to a spider electra (or however you spell it), and it was much faster, but it kept getting jammed.
i never found the “perfect gun” or whatever you’d call it, because the nearest course up-ed the prices on everything & eventually closed.[/quote]
Tippmans are probably most durable gun on the market and best for woods , but if you play real paintball (Like in Nppl rankings) like me you will see were i’m coming from.

Spyder’s are good guns if you just started playing paintball and you want to play speedball , though they break like REALLY easy. I broke the grip completely off from sliding into bunkers landing on the grip.

You probably had the bolt that came with it which a pretty crappy 1 and it chops alot of paint , suggest you buy th skeleton bolt which is made for ion.

Read full topic

item.title: [Paintball] Is this a good deal?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:1, topic:186005”]For a $300 budget, is this a good deal on a Smart Parts ION XE? It comes with a 7 (6 pod + 1 w/e, but I use it for a pod) pod harness, 6 pods, goggles, a hopper, a 20oz CO2 tank and maintenance supplies [squeegee, oil, etc.]

Here’s the link to the original eBay auction: NEW Smart Parts ION XE Elite Paintball Package Deal[/quote]
No cause you can’t use fucken co2 with a ION… IDIOT.

lol , i suggest you get diff deal cause nitrogen tanks are over 100 dollars…

io9:

Actually, there’s a reason I don’t use Nitrous; my paintball place only does CO2

Its not nitrous its nitrogen…

And how is it possible for any paintball field not to fill nitrogen when half the guns and people use it…

Only guns that run off c02 are the cheap spyders and tippmans.

And yes you HAVE to use nitrogen or compressed air tanks with a Ion unless you want to fuck it up totally.

Perfect deal for you right here…

http://www.actionvillage.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/eCS/Store/en/-/USD/DisplayProductInformation-Start;sid=mlLv-zSGv5XvNnNKwSYvUz5PUxivz_eaXek=?ProductID=TTrAqArb1MoAAAEUp9Pu3PDz
